channel.title: Practicals on Google Earth Engine for Conservation
channel.description: Recent content in Practicals on Google Earth Engine for Conservation

item.title: Practical 3: Visualising Bands
item.description: Here you will learn how to visualise images in GEE. It is important to be able to understand the different bands that form an satellite image. The ability to visualise different combinations of bands allows us to highlight useful features from the landscape. Let’s get started with the code… print('Hello OTS Class of Spring 2020'); //// Strings // Use single or double quotes to make a string var greetString = 'Why hello there'; // Use brackets () to pass arguments to functions print(greetString); Link to GEE code for Practical 2

item.title: Practical 2: Exploring Images
item.description: Here you will learn basic JavaScript syntax print('Hello OTS Class of Spring 2020'); //// Strings // Use single or double quotes to make a string var greetString = 'Why hello there'; // Use brackets () to pass arguments to functions print(greetString); Link to GEE code for Practical 2
